description:
Learn to paint like a Professional with this easy to learn technique that will amaze your friends and family!

In this course I will show you my easy to follow technique to painting in a stylised manner, because the process is very mechanical it will be easy for even a non-artist to get fantastic results - Try It you will love to paint after this course.

This course is like three in one because:

  • You cover creating a stylised image in Photoshop!
  • You cover how to produce an image to be printed on canvas!
  • You cover how to paint an image to canvas!

What you will learn - Process and tips

  • Prepare to paint master pieces
  • You will learn invaluable tips along the way
  • Time saving techniques
  • Easy to follow
  • Problem solving solutions
  • On Hand help via messages
  • Lifetime access to updates
  • Special announcements of new courses
  • And more...

I have loved to create this course for you and hope you will learn and prodcue great pieces of art - It would be great to feature these on my site please send them to me for critique or to add to my members gallery.

Most important have fun!!! painting can really help with stress and anxiety, so relax, pick up your brushes and enjoy the ride...
title: Learn to Paint Creating a Stylised Poster Painting
